title.rendered: Fundbox Podcast: Maximizing PPP Loan Forgiveness

content.rendered:
Listen to our half-hour discussion on How to Maximize Forgiveness of Your PPP Loan. We share and discuss the key steps and documents you’ll need to turn your funds from the Paycheck Protection Program into a grant, while you help support your employees and your small business during the impact of the coronavirus/COVID-19 pandemic.

Also read our related article, How to Help Maximize Your PPP Loan Forgiveness.
